verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> unto you <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, to cause the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.

<S%H2351>Outside<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6186>order<s%> it from the <S%H6153>evening<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
He shall <S%H6186>order<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> upon the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> there <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> shall be in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%>.

And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4634>rows<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> on a <S%H4635>row<s%>, upon the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> upon each <S%H4635>row<s%>, that it may be on the <S%H3899>bread<s%> for a <S%H234>memorial<s%>, even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> he shall set <S%H3117>it<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, being taken from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And it shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>'; and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>: for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto him of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>statute<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, whose <S%H1121>father<s%> was an <S%H376>Egyptian<s%>, went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and this <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> woman and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> argued <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>;

And the <S%H3482>Israelite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5344>blasphemed<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7043>Lord<s%>, and cursed. And they <S%H935>brought<s%> him unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>: (and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1704>Dibri<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>:)
And they <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>custody<s%>, that the <S%H6310>mind<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> might be showed <S%H6567>them<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> him that has <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; and let all that <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and let all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> stone <S%H7275>him<s%>.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H376>Whoever<s%> <S%H3588>curses<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> his <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

And he that <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>certainly<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> <S%H1616>him<s%>: as well the stranger, as he that is born in the <S%H249>land<s%>, when he <S%H5344>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4191>Lord<s%>, shall be put to death.
And <S%H376>he<s%> that <S%H5221>kills<s%> <S%H5315>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
And he that <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H5315>animal<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good<s%>; <S%H5315>animal<s%> for <S%H5315>animal<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>cause<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>; as he has <S%H6213>done<s%>, so shall it be done to <S%H6213>him<s%>;

<S%H7667>Breach<s%> for <S%H7667>breach<s%>, <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye<s%>, <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth<s%>: as he has <S%H5414>caused<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in a <S%H120>man<s%>, so shall it be done to him <S%H5414>again<s%>.
And he that <S%H5221>kills<s%> a <S%H929>animal<s%>, he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>: and he that kills a <S%H120>man<s%>, he shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
You shall have <S%H259>one<s%> manner of <S%H4941>law<s%>, as well for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, as for one of your own <S%H249>country<s%>: for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they should bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> him that had <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
